info.name: avsforum (actual forums) - Dark Theme
info.description: Dark theme with avsforum's logo colors (blue and green) for highlights.
info.additionalInfo:
This theme may work for other vBulletin forums, but I have not tested it.

Credit https://userstyles.org/users/354628 for original work, and https://userstyles.org/users/277624 for the updates
